titleInfo.title: Predictions for the LHC heavy-ion program

mods.abstract: Apparently, universal trends have been observed in relativistic nucleus-nucleus collisions up to RHIC energies. Here, we review these trends and we discuss their agnostic extrapolation to heavy-ion collisions at the LHC.

titleInfo.title: JOURNAL OF PHYSICS G-NUCLEAR AND PARTICLE PHYSICS
